test.name: TEST-DEF-02000
test.description: Implements the ARINC-653 Part 3 tests related to the SET_PARTITION_MODE API.

teststep.description: T-API-PART-0230:0010 - Test the service SET_PARTITION_MODE to WARM_START
T-API-PART-0230:0020 - Test the service SET_PARTITION_MODE to IDLE
T-API-PART-0230:0030 - Test the service SET_PARTITION_MODE to WARM_START
T-API-PART-0230:0035 - Test the service SET_PARTITION_MODE to COLD_START
T-API-PART-0230:0040 - Test the service SET_PARTITION_MODE from NORMAL to NORMAL
T-API-PART-0230:0050 - Test the service SET_PARTITION_MODE when OPERATING_MODE does not represent an existing mode
T-API-PART-0230:0060 - Test the service SET_PARTITION_MODE changing from COLD_START to WARM_START.
